entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
